item.title: META
item.description: score:82 Chances: Meta Platforms is testing Meta AI with WhatsApp, Instagram, and Messenger users in India and parts of Africa, indicating the company’s plans to scale its AI offerings across its various apps. META has unveiled next-generation custom-made chips to address the needs of its expanding AI workloads, showcasing the company’s commitment to technological advancement.
